name: .21 FUTURE NFT DISPLAY TOMBSTONE *SOUND ON*. Lucky Lucy van Delft
description:
basically these kind of things can not be left to their own devices. upon death hopefully the whole NFT archive will be in legacy mode already to benefit other artists after I die (one day). so far haven't figured out how to do that but this is a great start! just to be safe i already sent a version of the this to a tombstone maker so they can start thinking about it in advance. (and mainly to take credit for this original idea before they think of it.)

year created - 2021



https://soundbible.com/882-Heart-Rate-Monitor-Flatline.html#
shout out for the sound clip!

creative commons license

love,
lucy
xxoo

"i did my best, gave a shit and found a gun in vermeer's view of delft."

(p.s. will also mint this exact same thing in opensea just because it's really important, but it wont be for sale.)
